Package gui.gamehome

Class Market

java.lang.Object
gui.gamehome.Market
All Implemented Interfaces:
Gui
public class Market extends Object implements Gui
The Market class represents the market interface within the game. It allows players to buy and sell items and athletes. This class extends the Gui interface.

  • Constructor Details

    • Market

      public Market(GameEnvironment gameEnvironment)
      The constructor for the Market class. It initializes the components and updates the GUI according to the game environment.
      Parameters:
      gameEnvironment - The current game environment

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Launch the application. This is the main method that starts the application. It creates an instance of the GameEnvironment and Market and makes the window visible.
      Parameters:
      args - Command line arguments

    • displayTeamTable

      public void displayTeamTable(Team team, JTable table, double priceModifier)
      This method displays the details of each athlete in a team in a table. The price of the athlete is modified based on the provided modifier.
      Parameters:
      team - The team whose athletes are to be displayed.
      table - The table where the athletes are to be displayed.
      priceModifier - The factor by which the price of the athletes is to be modified.

    • displayItemTable

      public void displayItemTable(ArrayList<Items> marketItems, JTable table, double priceModifier)
      This method displays the details of each item in the provided list in a table. The price of the item is modified based on the provided modifier.
      Parameters:
      marketItems - The list of items to be displayed.
      table - The table where the items are to be displayed.
      priceModifier - The factor by which the price of the items is to be modified.

    • isMainTeamFull

      public boolean isMainTeamFull()
      This method checks if the main team is full.
      Returns:
      True if the main team is full, False otherwise.

    • isReserveTeamFull

      public boolean isReserveTeamFull()
      This method checks if the reserve team is full.
      Returns:
      True if the reserve team is full, False otherwise.

      public void updateAthleteMarket()
